name: PAAPI

types.name: Error
types.comment:
Error representation of PAAPI.

In case of rate-limit, PAAPI returns HTTP 503,
that will be translated to `RateLimit`.
Other `Http.Error` will be wrapped in `HttpError`.

values.name: doGet
values.comment:
Task to attempt requesting PAAPI.

It fetches current time and generate GET request to PAAPI, then send it.
values.type: PAAPI.Locale -> PAAPI.Credentials -> PAAPI.AssociateTag -> Xml.Decode.Decoder a -> List ( String, String ) -> Task.Task PAAPI.Error a

values.name: get
values.comment:
Generate `Http.Request` to PAAPI.

Always uses GET method.
values.type: Time.Time -> PAAPI.Locale -> PAAPI.Credentials -> PAAPI.AssociateTag -> Xml.Decode.Decoder a -> List ( String, String ) -> Http.Request a
